# Reading List

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(RefManageR)
BibOptions(style = "markdown", bib.style = "authoryear", first.inits = FALSE, 
           no.print.fields = c("issn", "isbn",
                               "eprint", "eprinttype", 
                               "url", "urldate", 
                               "series"))
```
